identity.mission: Create a high-impact, Nike-inspired sports commerce experience that feels premium but contains deliberate flaws for a bug-hunting challenge.

headings.usage: Use for all major headings (h1, h2, h3). Must be impactful and often oversized.

body.usage: Clean, legible, high readability for product descriptions and UI text.

usage_rules.background: Primary background is White (#FFFFFF). Use Light Gray (#F5F5F5) for secondary sections.
usage_rules.text: Headings are always Black (#000000). Body text is Dark Gray (#333333).
usage_rules.buttons: Primary CTAs are Black with White text OR Accent (Volt) with Black text.

features: Sharp Edges (No rounded corners on buttons/cards)

layout_strategies.grid_system: Bento Grid (Mode A) for categories. 3-Column Masonry for products.
layout_strategies.spacing: Generous. Use p-8 to p-24. Do not clutter.
layout_strategies.containers: Max-width 1440px for main content. Full width for Hero sections.

buttons.primary: bg-black text-white hover:bg-zinc-800 uppercase font-bold px-8 py-4 rounded-none tracking-widest
buttons.secondary: border-2 border-black text-black hover:bg-black hover:text-white uppercase font-bold px-8 py-4 rounded-none tracking-widest
buttons.accent: bg-[#D0FF00] text-black hover:bg-[#B3DB00] uppercase font-bold px-8 py-4 rounded-none tracking-widest

cards.product: group relative bg-gray-50 aspect-[3/4] overflow-hidden hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300

inputs.style: border-b-2 border-black bg-transparent px-0 py-2 focus:outline-none focus:border-[#D0FF00] font-bold text-xl placeholder:text-gray-400 rounded-none

implementation_challenges_for_bugs.note: These bugs MUST be implemented deliberately. They are the core feature of this challenge.
list: 1. Login: Username check is strictly case-sensitive (e.g., 'user1' works, 'User1' fails).
2. Login: Password visibility toggle icon changes, but input type remains 'password' (dots don't reveal).
3. Navigation: Cart icon count updates only after page refresh, not immediately via state.
4. Mobile Menu: Hamburger menu opens but close button is hidden (z-index issue).
5. Hero Section: 'Shop Now' CTA button z-index is lower than the background overlay, making it unclickable.
6. Product Filters: Selecting 'Men' category triggers the 'Women' filter in the backend logic.
7. Sorting: 'Price Low-High' sorts by string value (e.g., '100' comes before '20').
8. Search Bar: Pressing 'Enter' triggers a page reload instead of submitting the search query.
9. Product Gallery: The second thumbnail image in the product detail page is a broken link (404).
10. Size Selection: Clicking a size button updates the state but does not apply the 'active' visual style (user doesn't know it's selected).
11. Add to Cart: Toast notification displays 'Error adding to cart' message even when the action is successful.
12. Cart Quantity: Input field allows negative numbers (e.g., -1 items).
13. Cart Total: Subtotal calculation logic ignores the last item in the list.
14. Checkout Form: Zip code field accepts letters and special characters.
15. Checkout Options: 'Billing same as shipping' checkbox toggle does nothing when clicked.
16. Payment Form: Credit card number input does not auto-format (no spaces between groups).
17. Profile: 'Save Changes' button lacks an onClick handler (dead button).
18. Footer: The 'Returns & Exchanges' link points to a 404 page.
19. Responsive Grid: Product cards on mobile view are too narrow (missing min-width or flex-wrap).
20. Accessibility: Main CTA buttons have `outline: none` on focus, making keyboard navigation impossible.

instructions_to_main_agent.step_1: Implement the full E-commerce flow (Login, Home, Product, Cart, Checkout) using React, Tailwind, and Shadcn.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_2: Apply the 'Performance Pro' design system (Black/White/Volt) strictly.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_3: While building, deliberately implement the 20 bugs listed in 'implementation_challenges_for_bugs'. Do not fix them.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_4: Ensure the UI looks professional and 'Nike-like' despite the functional bugs. The design must deceive the user into thinking it's perfect.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_5: Use the provided image URLs for content.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_6: Create a `bugs.md` file in the root listing these bugs for the user (the 'answer key').

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid Black or White.
Do not center everything. Use strong left alignment for text.
Use massive font sizes for headers.
